original_text: Ahab was so wicked that he worshipped useless idols, as the Amorites did. The Lord had chased those people out of the land so that the Israelites could live there.
korean_text: 그가 여호와께서 이스라엘 자손 앞에서 쫓아내신 아모리 사람의 모든 행함 같이 우상에게 복종하여 심히 가증하게 행하였더라

sentences.original_text: The Lord had chased those people out of the land
so that the Israelites could live there
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들이 그곳에 살 수 있도록
